portfolio.description: Curious about technology and its possibilities.
portfolio.404: The page you were looking for was not found.
portfolio.aboutMe: Since my childhood, I have been passionate about technology, so I decided to combine the useful with the pleasant, and today I am a fullstack developer. I don't have formal experience, like CLT, but I am a freelancer with some projects I am working on. I am eager to learn day by day and improve every aspect that a true fullstack developer can offer.
portfolio.project1Description: Useful tools for the Minecraft game.
portfolio.project2Description: Developed by a volunteer team of students from Faculdade de Tecnologia e Inova√ß√£o SENAC DF, I was the development leader for this project. This web app aims to provide self-assessments of soft skills.
portfolio.project3Description: E-commerce for clothing and accessories. I participated in the entire development process, from scratch to production, except for the UI.
portfolio.project4Description: Website to display the fictional PDTI/PSI 2025-26 of Banco do Brasil.
portfolio.project5Description: RESTful API that registers, retrieves, and updates students. Test-oriented.
